00035         public class HTTPServer : CsHTTPServer
00036         {
00037                 public string Folder;
00038 
00039                 public HTTPServer()     : base()
00040                 {
00041                         this.Folder = null;
00042                 }
00043 
00044                 public override void OnResponse(ref HTTPRequestStruct rq, ref HTTPResponseStruct rp)
00045                 {
00046                         string path = this.Folder + "\\" + rq.URL.PathAndQuery.ToString().Replace("/", "\\");
00047                         Media media = null;
00048 
00049                         if (Directory.Exists(path))
00050                         {
00051                                 if (File.Exists(path + "default.htm"))
00052                                         path += "\\default.htm";
00053                                 else
00054                                 {
00055                                         string[] dirs = Directory.GetDirectories(path);
00056                                         string[] files = Directory.GetFiles(path);
00057 
00058                                         rp.Headers["Content-Type"] = "text/html";
00059 
00060                                         string bodyStr = "<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN\">\n";
00061                                         bodyStr += "<HTML><HEAD>\n";
00062                                         bodyStr += "<META http-equiv=Content-Type content=\"text/html; charset=windows-1252\">\n";
00063                                         bodyStr += "</HEAD>\n";
00064                                         bodyStr += "<BODY><p>Folder listing, to do not see this add a 'default.htm' document\n<p>\n";
00065                                         for (int i = 0; i < dirs.Length; i++)
00066                                                 bodyStr += "<br><a href = \"" + rq.URL + Path.GetFileName(dirs[i]) + "/\">[" + Path.GetFileName(dirs[i]) + "]</a>\n";
00067                                         for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
00068                                                 bodyStr += "<br><a href = \"" + rq.URL + Path.GetFileName(files[i]) + "\">" + Path.GetFileName(files[i]) + "</a>\n";
00069                                         bodyStr += "</BODY></HTML>\n";
00070 
00071                                         rp.BodyData = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(bodyStr);
00072                                         return;
00073                                 }
00074                         }
00075 
00076                         if ((media = MediaDB.Instance.HashToMedia(rq.URL.PathAndQuery.TrimStart(new char[] { '/' }))) != null)
00077                         {
00078                                 System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(media.uri.Scheme == Uri.UriSchemeFile);
00079                                 path = media.uri.LocalPath;
00080                         }
00081 
00082                         if (rq.URL.PathAndQuery.ToString() == "/crossfade.xml")
00083                         {
00084                                 P2PDB_MediaDB mdb = new P2PDB_MediaDB();
00085                                 mdb.mediaList = MediaDB.Instance.mediaList;
00086 
00087                                 XmlSerializer s = new XmlSerializer(typeof(P2PDB_MediaDB));
00088                                 Stream w = new MemoryStream();
00089                                 s.Serialize(w, mdb);
00090                                 w.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);
00091                                 rp.fs = w;
00092 
00093                                 rp.Headers["Content-Type"] = "text/xml";
00094                                 rp.Headers["Last-Modified"] = DateTime.Now.ToString("r");
00095                                 rp.Headers["Accept-Ranges"] = "none";
00096                                 rp.Headers["Content-Length"] = w.Length;
00097                                 rp.Headers["Connection"] = "close";
00098                         }
00099                         else if (File.Exists(path))
00100                         {
00101                                 RegistryKey rk = Registry.ClassesRoot.OpenSubKey(Path.GetExtension(path), true);
00102 
00103                                 // Get the data from a specified item in the key.
00104                                 String s = (String)rk.GetValue("Content Type");
00105 
00106                                 // Open the stream and read it back.
00107                                 rp.fs = File.Open(path, FileMode.Open);
00108                                 if (s != "")
00109                                     rp.Headers["Content-Type"] = s;
00110 
00111                                 System.IO.FileInfo fi = new System.IO.FileInfo(path);
00112                                 rp.Headers["Last-Modified"] = fi.LastWriteTime.ToString("r");
00113                                 rp.Headers["Accept-Ranges"] = "none";
00114                                 rp.Headers["Content-Length"] = fi.Length.ToString();
00115                                 rp.Headers["Connection"] = "close";
00116                         }
00117                         else
00118                         {
00119                                 rp.status = (int)RespState.NOT_FOUND;
00120                                 rp.Headers["Accept-Ranges"] = "none";
00121                                 rp.Headers["Connection"] = "close";
00122                                 rp.Headers["Content-Type"] = "text/html";
00123 
00124                                 string bodyStr = "<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN\">\n";
00125                                 bodyStr += "<HTML><HEAD>\n";
00126                                 bodyStr += "<META http-equiv=Content-Type content=\"text/html; charset=windows-1252\">\n";
00127                                 bodyStr += "</HEAD>\n";
00128                                 bodyStr += "<BODY>File not found!!</BODY></HTML>\n";
00129 
00130                                 rp.BodyData = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(bodyStr);
00131                         }
00132                 }
00133 
00134                 public override void Start(string theFolder)
00135                 {
00136                         this.Folder = theFolder;
00137                         base.Start(theFolder);

00144         public abstract class CsHTTPServer : MarshalByRefObject
00145         {
00146                 private int portNum = 21000;
00147                 private TcpListener listener;
00148                 System.Threading.Thread Thread;
00149 
00150                 public Hashtable respStatus;
00151 
00152                 public string Name = "Crossfade/1.0";
00153 
00154                 public bool IsAlive
00155                 {
00156                         get
00157                         {
00158                                 return this.Thread.IsAlive;
00159                         }
00160                 }
00161 
00162                 public CsHTTPServer()
00163                 {
00164                         respStatusInit();
00165                 }
00166 
00167                 public CsHTTPServer(int thePort)
00168                 {
00169                         portNum = thePort;
00170                         respStatusInit();
00171                 }
00172 
00173                 private void respStatusInit()
00174                 {
00175                         respStatus = new Hashtable();
00176 
00177                         respStatus.Add(200, "200 OK");
00178                         respStatus.Add(201, "201 Created");
00179                         respStatus.Add(202, "202 Accepted");
00180                         respStatus.Add(204, "204 No Content");
00181 
00182                         respStatus.Add(301, "301 Moved Permanently");
00183                         respStatus.Add(302, "302 Redirection");
00184                         respStatus.Add(304, "304 Not Modified");
00185 
00186                         respStatus.Add(400, "400 Bad Request");
00187                         respStatus.Add(401, "401 Unauthorized");
00188                         respStatus.Add(403, "403 Forbidden");
00189                         respStatus.Add(404, "404 Not Found");
00190 
00191                         respStatus.Add(500, "500 Internal Server Error");
00192                         respStatus.Add(501, "501 Not Implemented");
00193                         respStatus.Add(502, "502 Bad Gateway");
00194                         respStatus.Add(503, "503 Service Unavailable");
00195                 }
00196 
00197                 public void Listen()
00198                 {
00199 
00200                         bool done = false;
00201 
00202                         listener = new TcpListener(portNum);
00203                         //listener.Server.SetSocketOption(SocketOptionLevel.Socket, SocketOptionName.ReuseAddress, true);
00204                         listener.Start();
00205 
00206                         WriteLog("Listening On: " + portNum.ToString());
00207 
00208                         while (!done)
00209                         {
00210                                 WriteLog("Waiting for connection...");
00211 
00212                                 try
00213                                 {
00214                                         CsHTTPRequest newRequest = new CsHTTPRequest(listener.AcceptTcpClient(), this);
00215                                         Thread Thread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(newRequest.Process));
00216                                         Thread.Name = "HTTP Request";
00217                                         Thread.Start();
00218                                 }
00219                                 catch (SocketException)
00220                                 {
00221                                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("SocketException on CsHTTPRequest-Loop!");
00222                                 }
00223                         }
00224 
00225                 }
00226 
00227                 public void WriteLog(string EventMessage)
00228                 {
00229                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print(EventMessage);
00230                 }
00231 
00232                 public virtual void Start(string theFolder)
00233                 {
00234                         this.Thread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(this.Listen));
00235                         this.Thread.Start();
00236                 }
00237 
00238                 public void Stop()
00239                 {
00240                         listener.Stop();
00241                         this.Thread.Abort();
00242                 }
00243 
00244                 public abstract void OnResponse(ref HTTPRequestStruct rq, ref HTTPResponseStruct rp);
00245         }
